colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES DAM CAN CHOS RGYAL NANG SGRUB LA BRTEN PA'I ZOR GYI CHO GA NGAG 'DON DU BSGRIGS PA 'DI YANG RJE MKHAN CHEN CHOS RGYAL GYIS MDZAD PA'I CHOS RGYAL GYI PHU SGRUB KYI ZOR CHOG LA GZHI BYAS TE ^MI BSKYOD DGYES BZHAD RDO RJES BRIS PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I MDO SNGAGS ZUNG 'BREL GYI BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE 'DI NYID PHYOGS DUS KUN TU NYI 'OD 'BUM PHRAG DUS GCIG TU SHAR BA BZHIN DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG GU ,SARBA MANGGA LAm,, ,,)
